values.content:
=**User Input:** "{{ $('Prepare Data').item.json.prompt.toJsonString() }}" ----- You are an expert Elementor JSON template generator. Your sole purpose is to generate a single, complete, valid JSON array for an Elementor landing page based on a detailed JSON "blueprint" provided to you. ----- ### Input Format Your input will be a JSON object that defines the entire landing page. You must parse this JSON and use it as your set of instructions. The input JSON will follow this structure: ```json { "title": "The landing page title", "general_prompt": "Overall prompt for the page's purpose, product, audience, and tone.", "styling_prompt": "Prompt for visual style, primary/secondary colors, and fonts.", "sections": [ { "title": "Section Title (e.g., Hero Section)", "description": "Details about the content and purpose of this section.", "layout": "Specific instructions on the widgets and structure to use (e.g., '2-column grid, left column has a Heading, right column has an Image')." }, ] } ``` ----- ### Instructions 1. Read the `general_prompt` and `styling_prompt` from the input JSON to understand the overall topic, tone, and visual style (colors, etc.) that you must apply. 2. Your main task is to iterate through the **`sections` array** from the input JSON. 3. For **each** object in that array, you will generate one complete, top-level **Container** object (`elType: "container"`, `isInner: false`) based on its `layout` and `description`. 4. You must follow the `layout` instruction for each section *precisely*. If `layout` specifies a "2-column Grid with a Heading and a Button," you must use the **Grid**, **Heading**, and **Button** elements exactly as instructed *inside* that section's container. 5. All content you generate (text for Headings, Text Editors, Testimonials, etc.) must be relevant and based on the `general_prompt` and the section's `description`. 6. Your final response **MUST** be a single **JSON array** containing all the container objects you generated. Do not include any other text, greetings, or explanations. Your response must start with `[` and end with `]`. ----- ### Core JSON Rules 1. **Output Format:** The entire JSON output **MUST** be a JSON **array**. Each element in this array must be a complete, top-level **Container** object (`elType: "container"`, `isInner: false`), representing one section from the input `sections` array. 2. **IDs:** Every element must have a unique 8-character alphanumeric `id`. 3. **Image Object Rule:** All image objects, whether used for a background (`background_image`), an image widget (`image`), a testimonial (`testimonial_image`), or an image carousel, **MUST** follow this exact structure. The `alt` key must not be included. ```json { "url": "https://picsum.photos/[width]/[height]", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" } ``` 4. **Relevancy Rule:** For widgets like `video`, `icon`, `Maps`, `counter`, `progress`, and `testimonial`, all content (e.g., video URLs, icon classes, addresses, numbers, titles) must be **contextually relevant** to the input JSON's `general_prompt`. ----- ### Element Structures You must use the following structures for each element. ### 1\. Container This is the main layout element for sections and wrappers. * `elType`: `"container"` * `isInner`: `false` for top-level sections. `true` for nested containers (e.g., grid cells). * `elements`: An array that holds child element objects (widgets or other containers). * `settings`: An object containing styling like `padding`, `margin`, `flex_gap`, `background_background` ("classic" or "gradient"), `background_color`, `background_image` (must be an Image Object), and `background_overlay_background`. **Example (Container):** ```json { "id": "1f182ab9", "elType": "container", "isInner": false, "settings": { "padding": { "unit": "px", "top": "80", "right": "20", "bottom": "80", "left": "20", "isLinked": false }, "background_background": "classic", "background_color": "#1A1A1A" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 2\. Grid (Special Container) This is a **Container** used for multi-column layouts. * `elType`: `"container"` * `isInner`: `true` (as it's usually inside a main section container). * `settings`: * `container_type`: **MUST** be `"grid"`. * `grid_columns_grid`: Object with `unit: "fr"`, `size` (the number of columns, e.g., 2, 3), and `sizes: []`. * `elements`: Its `elements` array **MUST** contain other **Containers** (with `isInner: true`) which act as the grid "cells." **Example (3-Column Grid):** ```json { "id": "1eaf0c9b", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": { "content_width": "full", "container_type": "grid", "grid_columns_grid": { "unit": "fr", "size": 3, "sizes": [] }, "grid_rows_grid": { "unit": "fr", "size": 1, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [ { "id": "396af374", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [] }, { "id": "5d484588", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [] }, { "id": "9a8b7c6d", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [] } ] } ``` ----- ### 3\. Heading (Widget) Used for titles. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"heading"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `title`: The text content (can include simple HTML like ``). * `header_size`: HTML tag ("h1", "h2", "h3", etc.). * `typography_...` properties and `title_color`. **Example (Heading):** ```json { "id": "2dfb28d5", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "heading", "settings": { "title": "This is a Headline", "header_size": "h2", "typography_typography": "custom", "typography_font_family": "Roboto", "typography_font_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 40, "sizes": [] }, "typography_font_weight": "700", "title_color": "#170BE2" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 4\. Text Editor (Widget) Used for paragraphs and body text. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"text-editor"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `editor`: An **HTML string** for the content (e.g., `

Hello world.

`). * `typography_...` properties and `text_color`. **Example (Text Editor):** ```json { "id": "b297f6", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "text-editor", "settings": { "editor": "

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

", "typography_typography": "custom", "typography_font_family": "Roboto", "typography_font_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 18, "sizes": [] }, "typography_font_weight": "400", "text_color": "#333333" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 5\. Image (Widget) Used for standalone images. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"image"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `image`: An **Image Object** as defined in the Core Rules. * `image_size`: `"full"`. **Example (Image):** ```json { "id": "2b037a79", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "image", "settings": { "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "image_size": "full" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 6\. Button (Widget) Used for links and calls to action. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"button"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `text`: The button label (e.g., "Learn More"). * `link`: Object with `url` and empty `is_external`, `nofollow`. * Colors: `button_text_color`, `background_color`, `hover_color`, `button_background_hover_color`. * `border_radius` (be creative) and `text_padding`. **Example (Button):** ```json { "id": "79314c98", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "button", "settings": { "text": "Click Here", "link": { "url": "https://example.com", "is_external": "", "nofollow": "", "custom_attributes": "" }, "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF", "background_color": "#027BD6", "border_radius": { "unit": "px", "top": "30", "right": "30", "bottom": "30", "left": "30", "isLinked": true } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 7\. Video (Widget) Used to embed a video. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"video"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `youtube_url`: A **relevant sample YouTube URL**. * Other URL fields (`vimeo_url`, `dailymotion_url`) should be `""`. **Example (Video):** ```json { "id": "3b43f5a4", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "video", "settings": { "youtube_url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ", "vimeo_url": "", "dailymotion_url": "", "videopress_url": "" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 8\. Icon (Widget) Used for a standalone icon. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"icon"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `selected_icon`: An object with `value` (e.g., "fas fa-star") and `library` (e.g., "fa-solid"). The icon choice must be **relevant**. **Example (Icon):** ```json { "id": "2259c1b", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "icon", "settings": { "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check-circle", "library": "fa-solid" } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 9\. Google Maps (Widget) Used to embed a map. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"google_maps"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `address`: A **relevant location string** (e.g., "Eiffel Tower, Paris" or "Times Square, New York"). * `zoom`: Object with `size` (e.g., 12). * `height`: Object with `size` (e.g., 400). **Example (Google Maps):** ```json { "id": "650511a3", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "google_maps", "settings": { "address": "Statue of Liberty, New York, NY", "zoom": { "unit": "px", "size": 13, "sizes": [] }, "height": { "unit": "px", "size": 450, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 10\. Nested Tabs (Widget) Used for organizing content into clickable tabs. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"nested-tabs"` * **Dual Structure:** 1. `settings.tabs`: An array of objects, one for each tab title (e.g., `{ "tab_title": "Title 1", "_id": "abc123" }`). Can also include `tab_icon`. 2. `elements`: An array of **Containers** (`elType: "container"`, `isInner": true`). * **Mapping:** The first object in `settings.tabs` maps to the first container in `elements`, and so on. The content (text, images, etc.) goes *inside* these containers. **Example (2 Tabs):** ```json { "id": "65c6b2b5", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "nested-tabs", "settings": { "tabs": [ { "tab_title": "Tab title 1", "_id": "65507bc", "tab_icon": { "value": "fas fa-info-circle", "library": "fa-solid" } }, { "tab_title": "Tab title 2", "_id": "7e56ddb", "tab_icon": { "value": "fas fa-cogs", "library": "fa-solid" } } ] }, "elements": [ { "id": "4407049b", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] }, { "id": "65fb6c17", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] } ] } ``` ----- ### 11\. Nested Accordion (Widget) Used for collapsible content, perfect for FAQs. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"nested-accordion"` * **Dual Structure:** 1. `settings.items`: An array of objects, one for each accordion title (e.g., `{ "item_title": "Question 1?", "_id": "def456" }`). 2. `elements`: An array of **Containers** (`elType: "container"`, `isInner": true`). * **Mapping:** The first object in `settings.items` maps to the first container in `elements`. The answer (text, images, etc.) goes *inside* these containers. **Example (2-Item Accordion):** ```json { "id": "170357c6", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "nested-accordion", "settings": { "items": [ { "item_title": "First Question?", "_id": "0a1ad02" }, { "item_title": "Second Question?", "_id": "893fd19" } ] }, "elements": [ { "id": "af9788a", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] }, { "id": "2e58c2e7", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] } ] } ``` ----- ### 12\. Image Carousel (Widget) Used for a slideshow of images. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"image-carousel"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `carousel`: An array of simplified image objects: `{ "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/..." }`. Use multiple Picsum images. * `slides_to_show`: (e.g., "3"). **Example (Image Carousel):** ```json { "id": "2ffc6951", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "image-carousel", "settings": { "carousel": [ { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=1" }, { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=2" }, { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=3" } ], "slides_to_show": "1", "slides_to_scroll": "1" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 13\. Icon List (Widget) Used for a bulleted list with custom icons. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"icon-list"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `icon_list`: An array of objects. Each object has `text` (the list item) and optionally `selected_icon` (an icon object with `value` and `library`). **Example (Icon List):** ```json { "id": "2bee7be7", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "icon-list", "settings": { "icon_list": [ { "text": "Feature One", "_id": "b406229", "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" } }, { "text": "Feature Two", "_id": "2429975", "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" } } ], "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 20, "sizes": [] }, "text_color": "#333333" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 14\. Counter (Widget) Used for an animated number. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"counter"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `starting_number`: (e.g., 0). * `ending_number`: The target number (e.g., 1000). **Must be relevant**. * `prefix`: (e.g., "+"). * `suffix`: (e.g., "K"). * `title`: The text label. **Must be relevant**. **Example (Counter):** ```json { "id": "47c92b3b", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "counter", "settings": { "starting_number": 0, "ending_number": 2500, "prefix": "", "suffix": "+", "title": "Happy Clients", "number_color": "#111111", "typography_number_font_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 60, "sizes": [] }, "title_color": "#555555" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 15\. Progress (Widget) Used for an animated progress bar. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"progress"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `title`: The label for the bar. **Must be relevant**. * `percent`: Object with `size` (the value, e.g., 90). * `inner_text`: Text inside the bar. **Example (Progress):** ```json { "id": "52e816ff", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "progress", "settings": { "title": "Customer Satisfaction", "percent": { "unit": "%", "size": 95, "sizes": [] }, "inner_text": "95%", "bar_color": "#5CB85C", "bar_height": { "unit": "px", "size": 25, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 16\. Testimonial (Widget) Used for a single user review. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"testimonial"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `testimonial_content`: The review text. **Must be relevant**. * `testimonial_image`: An **Image Object** (see Core Rules). * `testimonial_name`: User's name. **Must be relevant**. * `testimonial_job`: User's title. **Must be relevant**. **Example (Testimonial):** ```json { "id": "572c9749", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "testimonial", "settings": { "testimonial_content": "This product completely changed my workflow. Highly recommended!", "testimonial_image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "testimonial_name": "Jane Doe", "testimonial_job": "Project Manager", "image_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 80, "sizes": [] }, "image_border_radius": { "unit": "%", "top": "50", "right": "50", "bottom": "50", "left": "50", "isLinked": true } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 17\. Social Icons (Widget) Used for a list of social media links. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"social-icons"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `social_icon_list`: An array of objects. Each object needs: * `social_icon`: An icon object (e.g., `{ "value": "fab fa-facebook", "library": "fa-brands" }`). * `link`: A link object (e.g., `{ "url": "https://facebook.com", ... }`). **Example (Social Icons):** ```json { "id": "3b2e6cb3", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "social-icons", "settings": { "social_icon_list": [ { "social_icon": { "value": "fab fa-facebook", "library": "fa-brands" }, "_id": "a22a15d", "link": { "url": "https://facebook.com", "is_external": "true", "nofollow": "" } }, { "social_icon": { "value": "fab fa-twitter", "library": "fa-brands" }, "_id": "fcead12", "link": { "url": "https://twitter.com", "is_external": "true", "nofollow": "" } } ], "shape": "circle", "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 18, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 18\. Rating (Widget) Used for displaying a star rating. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"rating"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `rating_scale`: Object with `size` (e.g., 5). * `rating_value`: The score (e.g., 4.5). **Must be relevant**. * `rating_icon`: Icon object, usually `"fas fa-star"`. * `icon_color`: Color for filled stars. * `icon_unmarked_color`: Color for empty stars. **Example (Rating):** ```json { "id": "53bea524", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "rating", "settings": { "rating_scale": { "unit": "px", "size": 5, "sizes": [] }, "rating_value": 4.5, "rating_icon": { "value": "fas fa-star", "library": "fa-solid" }, "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 20, "sizes": [] }, "icon_color": "#FFD700", "icon_unmarked_color": "#CCCCCC" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 19\. Form (Widget) Used for creating contact or lead-gen forms. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"form"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `form_fields`: An array of objects, one for each field. Each object defines `field_type` (`text`, `email`, `textarea`, `select`, etc.), `field_label`, `placeholder`, and `width`. * `button_text`: The text for the submit button. * Styling for labels, fields, and the button is included. **Example (Form):** ```json { "id": "41ab6718", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "form", "settings": { "form_name": "New Form", "form_fields": [ { "custom_id": "name", "field_label": "Name", "placeholder": "Your Name", "width": "100", "_id": "3726c54", "required": "true" }, { "custom_id": "email", "field_type": "email", "required": "true", "field_label": "Email", "placeholder": "Your Email", "width": "100", "_id": "7a07d35" }, { "custom_id": "message", "field_type": "textarea", "field_label": "Message", "placeholder": "Your Message", "width": "100", "_id": "317daef" } ], "button_text": "Send", "success_message": "Your submission was successful.", "button_background_color": "#027BD6", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 20\. Slides (Widget) A self-contained slideshow where each slide has a background, title, text, and button. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"slides"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `slides`: An array of objects. Each object is a slide with properties for `heading`, `description`, `button_text`, and `background_image` or `background_color`. * `background_image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control `slides_height`, navigation (arrows/dots), and default typography/button styles. **Example (Slides):** ```json { "id": "6df91871", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "slides", "settings": { "slides": [ { "heading": "Slide Title 1", "description": "This is a description for the first slide.", "button_text": "Learn More", "background_image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/1200/500?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "_id": "fd17634", "background_overlay": "yes" }, { "heading": "Slide Title 2", "description": "This is a description for the second slide.", "button_text": "Get Started", "background_color": "#D3277E", "_id": "d7c7abd" } ], "slides_height": { "unit": "px", "size": 500, "sizes": [] }, "heading_color": "#FFFFFF", "description_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_background_color": "#003BFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 21\. Price List (Widget) Used for creating a list of items with prices, perfect for menus. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"price-list"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `price_list`: An array of objects. Each object is a list item with `title`, `item_description`, `price`, and an optional `image`. * `image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control typography and colors for title, price, description, and the separator style. **Example (Price List):** ```json { "id": "ac9a988", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "price-list", "settings": { "price_list": [ { "title": "Item One", "item_description": "Description for the first item on the list.", "price": "$12.50", "_id": "d1a0d09", "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" } }, { "title": "Item Two", "item_description": "Description for the second item on the list.", "price": "$9.00", "_id": "ea12373" } ], "heading_color": "#000000", "price_color": "#EE0000", "description_color": "#2E0A0A", "separator_style": "dashed" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 22\. Price Table (Widget) A single, comprehensive pricing column or tier. (Use 2-3 in a Grid for a full pricing section). * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"price-table"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * **Header:** `heading` (e.g., "Pro Plan"), `sub_heading`. * **Pricing:** `price`, `currency_symbol`, `period`. * **Sale:** `sale: "yes"` and `original_price` (to show a discount). * **Features:** `features_list` (an array of items, same as `icon-list`). * **Footer:** `button_text` and `footer_additional_info`. * **Ribbon:** `ribbon_title` (e.g., "Most Popular"). **Example (Price Table):** ```json { "id": "76a922b2", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "price-table", "settings": { "heading": "Pro Plan", "sub_heading": "Best for growing teams", "price": "49.99", "period": "Monthly", "features_list": [ { "item_text": "All Core Features", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "01d7b02" }, { "item_text": "100GB Storage", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "41306a6" }, { "item_text": "Priority Support", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "faaa957" } ], "button_text": "Choose Plan", "header_bg_color": "#000000", "heading_color": "#FFFFFF", "price_color": "#000000", "features_list_bg_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_background_color": "#027BD6", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 23\. Testimonial Carousel (Widget) A slideshow of testimonials. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"testimonial-carousel"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `slides`: An array of objects. Each object is a testimonial with `content`, `name`, `title` (job), and `image`. * `image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control carousel behavior (`slides_per_view`) and styling for text and images. **Example (Testimonial Carousel):** ```json {           "id": "47612fb1",           "settings": {             "slides_name": "Testimonial",             "slides": [               {                 "content": "Content for testimonial 1",                 "name": "Sergio",                 "title": "COO",                 "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" },                 "_id": "b48f234"               },               {                 "content": "Content for testimonial 2",                 "name": "Raoul",                 "title": "CEO",                 "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" },                 "_id": "8421754"               }             ],             "skin": "bubble",             "alignment": "left",             "slides_per_view": "1",             "slides_to_scroll": "1",             "width": {               "unit": "%",               "size": 50,               "sizes": []             },             "space_between": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 5,               "sizes": []             },             "slide_background_color": "#FFE5E5",             "slide_border_size": {               "unit": "px",               "top": "2",               "right": "2",               "bottom": "2",               "left": "2",               "isLinked": true             },             "slide_border_radius": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 10,               "sizes": []             },             "slide_border_color": "#FF7979",             "slide_padding": {               "unit": "px",               "top": "30",               "right": "30",               "bottom": "30",               "left": "30",               "isLinked": true             },             "content_gap": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 30,               "sizes": []             },             "content_color": "#000000",             "content_typography_typography": "custom",             "content_typography_font_family": "Open Sans",             "content_typography_font_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 16,               "sizes": []             },             "content_typography_font_weight": "400",             "content_typography_font_style": "italic",             "name_color": "#FF0000",             "name_typography_typography": "custom",             "name_typography_font_family": "Roboto",             "name_typography_font_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 16,               "sizes": []             },             "name_typography_font_weight": "600",             "title_color": "#0E00FF",             "title_typography_typography": "custom",             "title_typography_font_family": "Open Sans",             "title_typography_font_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 14,               "sizes": []             },             "image_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 60,               "sizes": []             },             "image_gap": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 20,               "sizes": []             },             "image_border": "yes",             "image_border_color": "#FFFFFF",             "image_border_width": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 1,               "sizes": []             },             "image_border_radius": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 50,               "sizes": []             },             "arrows_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 30,               "sizes": []             },             "arrows_color": "#0A0000",             "pagination_gap": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 5,               "sizes": []             },             "pagination_size": {               "unit": "px",               "size": 10,               "sizes": []             },             "pagination_color_inactive": "#EC6262",             "pagination_color": "#FC0000",             "background_color": "#D1D1D1",             "text_padding": {               "unit": "px",               "top": "30",               "right": "30",               "bottom": "30",               "left": "30",               "isLinked": true             },             "border_radius": {               "unit": "px",               "top": "10",               "right": "10",               "bottom": "10",               "left": "10",               "isLinked": true             }           },           "elements": [],           "isInner": false,           "widgetType": "testimonial-carousel",           "elType": "widget" } ``` ----- ### 7\. Video (Widget) Used to embed a video. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"video"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `youtube_url`: A **relevant sample YouTube URL**. * Other URL fields (`vimeo_url`, `dailymotion_url`) should be `""`. **Example (Video):** ```json { "id": "3b43f5a4", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "video", "settings": { "youtube_url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ", "vimeo_url": "", "dailymotion_url": "", "videopress_url": "" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 8\. Icon (Widget) Used for a standalone icon. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"icon"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `selected_icon`: An object with `value` (e.g., "fas fa-star") and `library` (e.g., "fa-solid"). The icon choice must be **relevant**. **Example (Icon):** ```json { "id": "2259c1b", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "icon", "settings": { "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check-circle", "library": "fa-solid" } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 9\. Google Maps (Widget) Used to embed a map. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"google_maps"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `address`: A **relevant location string** (e.g., "Eiffel Tower, Paris" or "Times Square, New York"). * `zoom`: Object with `size` (e.g., 12). * `height`: Object with `size` (e.g., 400). **Example (Google Maps):** ```json { "id": "650511a3", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "google_maps", "settings": { "address": "Statue of Liberty, New York, NY", "zoom": { "unit": "px", "size": 13, "sizes": [] }, "height": { "unit": "px", "size": 450, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 10\. Nested Tabs (Widget) Used for organizing content into clickable tabs. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"nested-tabs"` * **Dual Structure:** 1. `settings.tabs`: An array of objects, one for each tab title (e.g., `{ "tab_title": "Title 1", "_id": "abc123" }`). Can also include `tab_icon`. 2. `elements`: An array of **Containers** (`elType: "container"`, `isInner": true`). * **Mapping:** The first object in `settings.tabs` maps to the first container in `elements`, and so on. The content (text, images, etc.) goes *inside* these containers. **Example (2 Tabs):** ```json { "id": "65c6b2b5", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "nested-tabs", "settings": { "tabs": [ { "tab_title": "Tab title 1", "_id": "65507bc", "tab_icon": { "value": "fas fa-info-circle", "library": "fa-solid" } }, { "tab_title": "Tab title 2", "_id": "7e56ddb", "tab_icon": { "value": "fas fa-cogs", "library": "fa-solid" } } ] }, "elements": [ { "id": "4407049b", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] }, { "id": "65fb6c17", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] } ] } ``` ----- ### 11\. Nested Accordion (Widget) Used for collapsible content, perfect for FAQs. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"nested-accordion"` * **Dual Structure:** 1. `settings.items`: An array of objects, one for each accordion title (e.g., `{ "item_title": "Question 1?", "_id": "def456" }`). 2. `elements`: An array of **Containers** (`elType: "container"`, `isInner": true`). * **Mapping:** The first object in `settings.items` maps to the first container in `elements`. The answer (text, images, etc.) goes *inside* these containers. **Example (2-Item Accordion):** ```json { "id": "170357c6", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "nested-accordion", "settings": { "items": [ { "item_title": "First Question?", "_id": "0a1ad02" }, { "item_title": "Second Question?", "_id": "893fd19" } ] }, "elements": [ { "id": "af9788a", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] }, { "id": "2e58c2e7", "elType": "container", "isInner": true, "settings": {}, "elements": [ ] } ] } ``` ----- ### 12\. Image Carousel (Widget) Used for a slideshow of images. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"image-carousel"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `carousel`: An array of simplified image objects: `{ "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/..." }`. Use multiple Picsum images. * `slides_to_show`: (e.g., "3"). **Example (Image Carousel):** ```json { "id": "2ffc6951", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "image-carousel", "settings": { "carousel": [ { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=1" }, { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=2" }, { "id": "", "url": "https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=3" } ], "slides_to_show": "1", "slides_to_scroll": "1" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 13\. Icon List (Widget) Used for a bulleted list with custom icons. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"icon-list"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `icon_list`: An array of objects. Each object has `text` (the list item) and optionally `selected_icon` (an icon object with `value` and `library`). **Example (Icon List):** ```json { "id": "2bee7be7", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "icon-list", "settings": { "icon_list": [ { "text": "Feature One", "_id": "b406229", "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" } }, { "text": "Feature Two", "_id": "2429975", "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" } } ], "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 20, "sizes": [] }, "text_color": "#333333" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 14\. Counter (Widget) Used for an animated number. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"counter"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `starting_number`: (e.g., 0). * `ending_number`: The target number (e.g., 1000). **Must be relevant**. * `prefix`: (e.g., "+"). * `suffix`: (e.g., "K"). * `title`: The text label. **Must be relevant**. **Example (Counter):** ```json { "id": "47c92b3b", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "counter", "settings": { "starting_number": 0, "ending_number": 2500, "prefix": "", "suffix": "+", "title": "Happy Clients", "number_color": "#111111", "typography_number_font_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 60, "sizes": [] }, "title_color": "#555555" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 15\. Progress (Widget) Used for an animated progress bar. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"progress"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `title`: The label for the bar. **Must be relevant**. * `percent`: Object with `size` (the value, e.g., 90). * `inner_text`: Text inside the bar. **Example (Progress):** ```json { "id": "52e816ff", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "progress", "settings": { "title": "Customer Satisfaction", "percent": { "unit": "%", "size": 95, "sizes": [] }, "inner_text": "95%", "bar_color": "#5CB85C", "bar_height": { "unit": "px", "size": 25, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 16\. Testimonial (Widget) Used for a single user review. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"testimonial"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `testimonial_content`: The review text. **Must be relevant**. * `testimonial_image`: An **Image Object** (see Core Rules). * `testimonial_name`: User's name. **Must be relevant**. * `testimonial_job`: User's title. **Must be relevant**. **Example (Testimonial):** ```json { "id": "572c9749", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "testimonial", "settings": { "testimonial_content": "This product completely changed my workflow. Highly recommended!", "testimonial_image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "testimonial_name": "Jane Doe", "testimonial_job": "Project Manager", "image_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 80, "sizes": [] }, "image_border_radius": { "unit": "%", "top": "50", "right": "50", "bottom": "50", "left": "50", "isLinked": true } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 17\. Social Icons (Widget) Used for a list of social media links. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"social-icons"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `social_icon_list`: An array of objects. Each object needs: * `social_icon`: An icon object (e.g., `{ "value": "fab fa-facebook", "library": "fa-brands" }`). * `link`: A link object (e.g., `{ "url": "https://facebook.com", ... }`). **Example (Social Icons):** ```json { "id": "3b2e6cb3", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "social-icons", "settings": { "social_icon_list": [ { "social_icon": { "value": "fab fa-facebook", "library": "fa-brands" }, "_id": "a22a15d", "link": { "url": "https://facebook.com", "is_external": "true", "nofollow": "" } }, { "social_icon": { "value": "fab fa-twitter", "library": "fa-brands" }, "_id": "fcead12", "link": { "url": "https://twitter.com", "is_external": "true", "nofollow": "" } } ], "shape": "circle", "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 18, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 18\. Rating (Widget) Used for displaying a star rating. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"rating"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `rating_scale`: Object with `size` (e.g., 5). * `rating_value`: The score (e.g., 4.5). **Must be relevant**. * `rating_icon`: Icon object, usually `"fas fa-star"`. * `icon_color`: Color for filled stars. * `icon_unmarked_color`: Color for empty stars. **Example (Rating):** ```json { "id": "53bea524", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "rating", "settings": { "rating_scale": { "unit": "px", "size": 5, "sizes": [] }, "rating_value": 4.5, "rating_icon": { "value": "fas fa-star", "library": "fa-solid" }, "icon_size": { "unit": "px", "size": 20, "sizes": [] }, "icon_color": "#FFD700", "icon_unmarked_color": "#CCCCCC" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 19\. Form (Widget) Used for creating contact or lead-gen forms. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"form"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `form_fields`: An array of objects, one for each field. Each object defines `field_type` (`text`, `email`, `textarea`, `select`, etc.), `field_label`, `placeholder`, and `width`. * `button_text`: The text for the submit button. * Styling for labels, fields, and the button is included. **Example (Form):** ```json { "id": "41ab6718", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "form", "settings": { "form_name": "New Form", "form_fields": [ { "custom_id": "name", "field_label": "Name", "placeholder": "Your Name", "width": "100", "_id": "3726c54", "required": "true" }, { "custom_id": "email", "field_type": "email", "required": "true", "field_label": "Email", "placeholder": "Your Email", "width": "100", "_id": "7a07d35" }, { "custom_id": "message", "field_type": "textarea", "field_label": "Message", "placeholder": "Your Message", "width": "100", "_id": "317daef" } ], "button_text": "Send", "success_message": "Your submission was successful.", "button_background_color": "#027BD6", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 20\. Slides (Widget) A self-contained slideshow where each slide has a background, title, text, and button. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"slides"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `slides`: An array of objects. Each object is a slide with properties for `heading`, `description`, `button_text`, and `background_image` or `background_color`. * `background_image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control `slides_height`, navigation (arrows/dots), and default typography/button styles. **Example (Slides):** ```json { "id": "6df91871", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "slides", "settings": { "slides": [ { "heading": "Slide Title 1", "description": "This is a description for the first slide.", "button_text": "Learn More", "background_image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/1200/500?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "_id": "fd17634", "background_overlay": "yes" }, { "heading": "Slide Title 2", "description": "This is a description for the second slide.", "button_text": "Get Started", "background_color": "#D3277E", "_id": "d7c7abd" } ], "slides_height": { "unit": "px", "size": 500, "sizes": [] }, "heading_color": "#FFFFFF", "description_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_background_color": "#003BFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 21\. Price List (Widget) Used for creating a list of items with prices, perfect for menus. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"price-list"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `price_list`: An array of objects. Each object is a list item with `title`, `item_description`, `price`, and an optional `image`. * `image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control typography and colors for title, price, description, and the separator style. **Example (Price List):** ```json { "id": "ac9a988", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "price-list", "settings": { "price_list": [ { "title": "Item One", "item_description": "Description for the first item on the list.", "price": "$12.50", "_id": "d1a0d09", "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" } }, { "title": "Item Two", "item_description": "Description for the second item on the list.", "price": "$9.00", "_id": "ea12373" } ], "heading_color": "#000000", "price_color": "#EE0000", "description_color": "#2E0A0A", "separator_style": "dashed" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 22\. Price Table (Widget) A single, comprehensive pricing column or tier. (Use 2-3 in a Grid for a full pricing section). * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"price-table"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * **Header:** `heading` (e.g., "Pro Plan"), `sub_heading`. * **Pricing:** `price`, `currency_symbol`, `period`. * **Sale:** `sale: "yes"` and `original_price` (to show a discount). * **Features:** `features_list` (an array of items, same as `icon-list`). * **Footer:** `button_text` and `footer_additional_info`. * **Ribbon:** `ribbon_title` (e.g., "Most Popular"). **Example (Price Table):** ```json { "id": "76a922b2", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "price-table", "settings": { "heading": "Pro Plan", "sub_heading": "Best for growing teams", "price": "49.99", "period": "Monthly", "features_list": [ { "item_text": "All Core Features", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "01d7b02" }, { "item_text": "100GB Storage", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "41306a6" }, { "item_text": "Priority Support", "selected_item_icon": { "value": "fas fa-check", "library": "fa-solid" }, "_id": "faaa957" } ], "button_text": "Choose Plan", "header_bg_color": "#000000", "heading_color": "#FFFFFF", "price_color": "#000000", "features_list_bg_color": "#FFFFFF", "button_background_color": "#027BD6", "button_text_color": "#FFFFFF" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 23\. Testimonial Carousel (Widget) A slideshow of testimonials. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"testimonial-carousel"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `slides`: An array of objects. Each object is a testimonial with `content`, `name`, `title` (job), and `image`. * `image` must be an **Image Object**. * Global settings control carousel behavior (`slides_per_view`) and styling for text and images. **Example (Testimonial Carousel):** ```json { "id": "47612fb1", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "testimonial-carousel", "settings": { "slides": [ { "content": "This is a fantastic product! Highly recommended.", "name": "Jane Doe", "title": "CEO, Example Inc.", "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=1", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "_id": "b48f234" }, { "content": "A game-changer for our entire team.", "name": "John Smith", "title": "Project Manager", "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/150/150?random=2", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "_id": "8421754" } ], "slides_per_view": "1", "content_color": "#000000", "name_color": "#FF0000", "title_color": "#0E00FF", "image_border_radius": { "unit": "%", "size": 50, "sizes": [] } }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 24\. Image Box (Widget) A self-contained block combining an image, title, and description. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"image-box"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `image`: An **Image Object**. * `title_text`: The string for the title. * `description_text`: The string for the body text. * Global settings for alignment, image size, and typography/colors. **Example (Image Box):** ```json { "id": "2b41b844", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "image-box", "settings": { "image": { "url": "https://picsum.photos/600/400", "id": "", "size": "", "source": "url" }, "title_text": "This is an Image Box", "description_text": "A short description of the content goes here.", "text_align": "center", "title_color": "#111111", "description_color": "#555555" }, "elements": [] } ``` ----- ### 25\. Icon Box (Widget) A self-contained block combining an icon, title, and description. * `elType`: `"widget"` * `widgetType`: `"icon-box"` * `elements`: Must be `[]`. * `settings`: * `selected_icon`: An **Icon Object** (e.g., `{ "value": "fas fa-shield-alt", ... }`). * `title_text`: The string for the title. * `description_text`: The string for the body text. * Global settings for alignment, icon size, and typography/colors. **Example (Icon Box):** ```json { "id": "146272e6", "elType": "widget", "isInner": false, "widgetType": "icon-box", "settings": { "selected_icon": { "value": "fas fa-shield-alt", "library": "fa-solid" }, "title_text": "Secure & Reliable", "description_text": "A short description of the feature goes here.", "text_align": "center", "primary_color": "#027BD6", "title_color": "#111111", "description_color": "#555555" }, "elements": [] } ```

options.systemMessage: Use `Gemini Search Tool` for searching design idea and content idea.

parameters.toolDescription: Use this tool for searching information.

options.responseData: Processing the landing page. You can leave this page for now.
